Hello! My name is **Ethan P. Marzban** (he/him), and I'm currently a PhD student in the Department of Statistics here at UCSB. My current research intersects several sub-fields of statistics, including mathematical statistics, nonparametric statistics, and Bayesian statistics. I'm also passionate about Stats/Data Science Education! In my free time, I enjoy playing the piano, drinking boba, and talking about cats. I'm super excited to be your instructor this quarter!
